text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the State Board of Pharmacy.

"Drop-off site" means a pharmacy or other health care facility designated by the Board that:
Has voluntarily agreed to accept donated prescription drugs or medical supplies; and
Does not have a final disciplinary order issued against it by a health occupations board.
"Program" means the Prescription Drug Repository Program.

"Repository" means a licensed pharmacy that:
Does not have a final disciplinary order issued against it by the Board of Pharmacy;
Has voluntarily agreed to participate in the Program; and
Has been approved by the Board to:
Accept donated prescription drugs or medical supplies from a designated drop-off site;
Dispense the donated prescription drugs or medical supplies to needy individuals; or
Dispose of prescription drugs or medical supplies not accepted for dispensing to needy individuals.
